10 
11 
12  tf::TransformListener listener;
13 
14  ros::Rate rate(10.0);
15  while (node.ok()){
16  tf::StampedTransform transform;
17  try{
18  listener.waitForTransform("world", "/kinect2_ir_optical_frame",
19  ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(3.0));
20  listener.lookupTransform("world", "/kinect2_ir_optical_frame",
21  ros::Time(0), transform);

23  }
